Examples
========

``torch_topological`` comes with several documented examples that
showcase different use cases. Please also see the
`examples <https://github.com/aidos-lab/pytorch-topological/tree/main/torch_topological/examples>`_
directory on GitHub for more details and full code.

   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:

   autoencoders
   summary_statistics
